title: Chomsky Noam - Hegemony or Survival: America's Quest for Glob
description:
"Hegemony or Survival: America\&#039;s Quest for Global Dominance,\" intellectual activist Noam Chomsky argues that U.S. policy -- the militarization of space, the ballistic-missile defense program, unilateralism, the dismantling of international agreements, and the response to the Iraqi crisis -- cohere in a drive for hegemony that ultimately threatens our survival.
